alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Lancaster; Middlesex; Northumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:27PM EDT until July 21 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GLOUCESTER...MIDDLESEX...SOUTHEASTERN NORTHUMBERLAND AND LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lancaster, or near Urbanna, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Kilmarnock, Lancaster and White Stone around 435 PM EDT. Wicomico Church around 445 PM EDT. Fair Port around 450 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Byrdton, Regina, Mollusk, Senora, Brook Vale, Nuttsville, Harmony Village, Bertrand, Grafton and Reedville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
